Serialized Form

  • Package networking

    • Class networking.SBMessage extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • type

          Type type
          Message type.

        • action

          Action action
          Message action, associated to its type.

        • timestamp

          java.util.Date timestamp
          Time this instance initialized.

        • sequence

          int sequence
          Sequence number. Invalid if smaller than 0.

        • sender

          java.lang.String sender
          Sender username, if any.

        • receiver

          java.lang.String receiver
          Recipient username, if any.

        • body

          java.lang.String body
          Message body.

        • flag

          boolean flag
          General purpose flag. You can use it to indicate something that is either true of false, e.g., whether login succeeds or not, etc.

  • Package pacman

    • Class pacman.GameEngine extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • frame

          javax.swing.JFrame frame

        • delay

          int delay
          Controls the speed of the game. The lower the value, the faster the game goes by

        • running

          boolean running
          A variable that keeps track of whether the game is running or not

        • width

          int width
          Sets the width of the canvas

        • height

          int height
          Sets the height of the canvas

        • state

          int state
          The state that the pacman is in which is used to animate the pacman character.

        • frameCount

          int frameCount
          Keeps track of the numbers of loops the game has executed.

        • animationRate

          int animationRate
          the speed in which the pacman character changes animation. It is inversely perportional to the speed.

        • pause

          boolean pause
          A variable to keep track of whether the game is paused.

        • start

          boolean start
          A variable to check whether the game has began.

        • alive

          boolean alive
          A variable to check if the pacman character is alive.

        • lives

          int lives
          Denotes the number of lives the pacman character has.

        • filenames

          java.lang.String[] filenames
          Contains the filenames for the ghost images.

        • fontColor

          java.awt.Color fontColor
          The color used for the in game text.

        • grid

          GridReadCreate grid
          An instance of GridReadCreate which represents the grid for the game.

        • pac

          Pacman pac
          An instance of Pacman, containing the character variables and methods.

        • gho

          Ghost gho
          An instance of Ghost, containing the character variables and methods for the AI.

        • gho2

          Ghost gho2

        • gho3

          Ghost gho3

        • gho4

          Ghost gho4

        • ghostNum

          int ghostNum
          The number of ghosts present in the game.

        • ghostsX

          int[] ghostsX
          An array of the x positions of the ghosts.

        • ghostsY

          int[] ghostsY
          An array of the y positions of the ghosts.

        • imgLdr

          ImageLoader imgLdr
          An instance of ImageLoader which is in charge of loading the images for all the characters.

    • Class pacman.GridReadCreate extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • pointWorth

          int pointWorth
          How many points each dot is worth

        • totalDots

          int totalDots
          Number of dots in the grid
